column1: Visitation will be from 4:00-8:00 p.m. on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at the Milford United Methodist Church and one hour prior to the services on Wednesday. Funeral services will be at 10:00 a.m. on Wednesday
column5: 2015 at the Milford United Methodist Church with Pastor Melinda Tucker officiating. Burial will be at Maple Grove Cemetery in Milford. Graveside military rites will be performed by the Watseka American Legion Post #23 and VFW Post #7450.
